stringmaster.name: Stringmaster
stringmaster.description: Increases the damage of all resonance properties by 12-24%. Hitting an enemy with a resonance skill increases attack power by 12-24%, stacking up to 2 times. When the owner is not on the field, their attack is increased by an additional 12-24%.

cosmicRipples.name: Cosmic Ripples
cosmicRipples.description: Energy recovery is increased by 12.8-25.6%. When the owner hits an enemy with a basic attack, the damage bonus of this type increases by 3.2-6.4%, stacking up to 5 times. This effect lasts for 8 seconds and triggers once every 0.5 seconds.

variation.name: Variation
variation.description: After using a resonance skill, restores 8-16 units of Concert energy. This effect can trigger once every 20 seconds.

augment.name: Augment
augment.description: When Resonance Release is activated, attack power is increased by 15-48%. The effect lasts for 15 seconds.

jinzhouKeeper.name: Jinzhou Keeper
jinzhouKeeper.description: When the Intro skill triggers, attack power is increased by 8-16% and health by 10-20%. The effect lasts for 15 seconds.

rectifierOfVoyager.name: Rectifier of Voyager
rectifierOfVoyager.description: After using a resonance skill, restores 8-12 units of resonance energy. This effect can trigger once every 20 seconds.

guardianRectifier.name: Guardian Rectifier
guardianRectifier.description: The damage bonus of basic and heavy attacks is increased by 12-24%.

agesOfHarvest.name: Ages of Harvest
agesOfHarvest.description: Grants a 12%-24% bonus to all elemental damage. Each basic attack grants 1 Blessing of Ages, stacking up to 4 times and disappearing after leaving combat. Upon accumulating 4 or more stacks, the weapon bearer absorbs them and increases resonance skill damage by 48%-96% for 2.5 seconds. The effect triggers once every 6 seconds.

verdantSummit.name: Verdant Summit
verdantSummit.description: Increases the damage of all Resonance properties by 12-24%. Activating the Intro Skill or Resonance Release increases heavy attack damage by 24-48%. The effect stacks up to 2 times and lasts for 14 seconds.

lustrousRazor.name: Lustrous Razor
lustrousRazor.description: Energy recovery is increased by 12.8-25.6%. Activating a Resonance Skill increases Resonance Release damage by 7-14%. The effect stacks up to 3 times and lasts for 12 seconds.

autumntrace.name: Autumntrace
autumntrace.description: When a basic or heavy attack deals damage, attack power is increased by 4-12.8%, stacking up to 5 times. The effect lasts for 7 seconds and can occur no more than once per second.

heliosCleaver.name: Helios Cleaver
heliosCleaver.description: For 12 seconds after activating a Resonance Skill, attack power increases by 3-6% every 2 seconds, stacking up to 4 times. Once the number of stacks reaches 12, the effect resets within 1 second.

broadblade41.name: Broadblade#41
broadblade41.description: When the Resonator's HP is above 80%, attack power is increased by 12%. If the Resonator's HP is between 40-80%, basic and heavy attacks restore 5-10% HP. The effect triggers no more than once every 8 seconds.

broadbladeOfNight.name: Broadblade of Night
broadbladeOfNight.description: After activating the Intro skill, attack power is increased by 8-16% for 10 seconds.

veritysHandle.name: Verity's Handle
veritysHandle.description: Increases elemental damage by 12%-24%. After using Resonance Release, increases its damage by 48%-96% for 8 seconds. Using a resonance skill extends the effect duration by 5 seconds. The duration increase can be triggered up to 3 times.

abyssSurges.name: Abyss Surges
abyssSurges.description: Energy recovery is increased by 12.8-25.6%. When an enemy takes damage from a resonance skill, the normal attack damage bonus is increased by 10-20% for 8 seconds. When a basic attack hits an enemy, the resonance skill damage bonus is increased by 10-20% for 8 seconds.

stonard.name: Stonard
stonard.description: After using a resonance skill, increases Resonance Release damage by 18%-54% for 15 seconds.

hollowMirage.name: Hollow Mirage
hollowMirage.description: When Resonance Release is used, grants 3 stacks of Iron Armor. Each stack increases attack power and defense by 3%-5%, stacking up to 3 times. When the resonator takes damage, the number of stacks decreases by 1.

gauntlets21D.name: Gauntlets#21D
gauntlets21D.description: When the resonator dashes or dodges, their attack is increased by 8%-16%. Increases counterattack damage by 50%-100% for 8 seconds. After performing a counterattack, once every 6 seconds, restores 5%-10% of the resonator's HP.

gauntletsOfNight.name: Gauntlets of Night
gauntletsOfNight.description: When the resonator performs an Intro skill, increases attack power by 8%-16% for 10 seconds.

marcato.name: Marcato
marcato.description: After using a resonance skill, increases Concert energy by 8-16 units. The effect can occur once every 20 seconds.

amityAccord.name: Amity Accord
amityAccord.description: After using an Intro skill, increases Resonance Release damage by 20%-40% for 15 seconds.

blazingBrilliance.name: Blazing Brilliance
blazingBrilliance.description: Increases attack power by 12%-24%. After dealing damage, grants 1 stack of Scorching Feather once every 0.5 seconds. After using a resonance skill, grants 5 stacks of Scorching Feather. Each stack increases resonance skill damage by 4%-8%. The effect stacks up to 14 times and lasts for 10 seconds.

emeraldOfGenesis.name: Emerald of Genesis
emeraldOfGenesis.description: Increases energy recovery by 12.8-25.6%. When using a skill, attack power is increased by 6-12%. The effect stacks up to 2 times and lasts for 10 seconds.

commandoOfConviction.name: Commando of Conviction
commandoOfConviction.description: When the Intro skill is activated, attack power is increased by 15-30% for 15 seconds.

lunarCutter.name: Lunar Cutter
lunarCutter.description: Upon entering combat, the owner gains 6 levels of Oath status. Each stack increases attack power by 2-4%, stacking up to 6 times. The effect triggers once every 12 seconds. Every 2 seconds, the number of stacks decreases by 1. The owner gains an additional 6 levels after defeating an enemy.

scaleSlasher.name: Scale Slasher
scaleSlasher.description: When using a resonance skill, restores 8-16 units of Concert energy. The effect triggers once every 20 seconds.

lumingloss.name: Lumingloss
lumingloss.description: When using a skill, the damage of basic and heavy attacks is increased by 20-64%, stacking up to 1 time. The effect lasts for 10 seconds and triggers once per second.

swordOfNight.name: Sword of Night
swordOfNight.description: When the Intro skill is activated, attack power is increased by 8-16% for 10 seconds.

swordOfVoyager.name: Sword of Voyager
swordOfVoyager.description: After using a resonance skill, restores 8-12 units of resonance energy. The effect triggers once every 20 seconds.

staticMist.name: Static Mist
staticMist.description: Increases energy recovery by 12.8%-25.6%. After using an Outro skill, increases the attack of the character switched to by 10%-20% once every 14 seconds.

novaburst.name: Novaburst
novaburst.description: After accelerating or dodging, increases attack power by 4%-8% for 8 seconds. The effect stacks up to 3 times.

undyingFlame.name: Undying Flame
undyingFlame.description: After using an Intro skill, increases resonance skill damage by 20%-40% for 15 seconds.

pistols26.name: Pistols#26
pistols26.description: When the resonator does not take damage, attack is increased by 6%-12% every 5 seconds. The effect stacks up to 2 times and lasts for 8 seconds. When taking damage, stacks decrease by 1, and the resonator restores 5%-10% HP.

thunderbolt.name: Thunderbolt
thunderbolt.description: After hitting a target with a normal or heavy attack, resonance skill damage is increased by 7%-23%. The effect can occur once per second, lasts for 10 seconds, and stacks up to 3 times.

cadenza.name: Cadenza
cadenza.description: Restores 8-16 units of Concert energy after using a resonance skill. The effect occurs once every 20 seconds.

pistolsOfNight.name: Pistols of Night
pistolsOfNight.description: Increases attack power by 8%-16% after using an Intro skill.

pistolsOfVoyager.name: Pistols of Voyager
pistolsOfVoyager.description: Restores 8-12 units of resonance energy after activating a resonance skill. The effect triggers once every 20 seconds.
